scale.name: OER-STEM Scale
scale.description: Scale used for identifying status of tasks and/or forum postings in the OER STEM courses.

scale.name: OER STEM Scale v2
scale.description:
Not Started: Participant has not submitted the activity online, or posted to discussion forum, for facilitator or peer review.

In Progress: Participant has submitted the activity online, or posted to discussion forum, but to complete the activity requires additional action from the participant in response to corrective facilitator feedback. (e.g. rewrite goal for lesson plan/align lesson goal with plan, identify a resource that doesn't restrict reuse or sharing by learners)

Complete: Participant has met all the requirements of the assignment and no additional action is required to complete the activity.
